text: A helicopter can carry 900 pounds per trip. If it needs to deliver 2,700 pounds of equipment, how many full trips will it make?
explanation: 2,700 ÷ 900 = 3 trips. So, it will make 3 full trips.

text: An aircraft fuel tank holds 600 gallons. If the plane consumes 50 gallons per hour, how long can it fly before needing to refuel?
explanation: 600 ÷ 50 = 12 hours of flight time before refueling.

text: A cargo plane’s maximum takeoff weight is 100,000 lbs and it currently weighs 95,000 lbs. What is the maximum cargo weight it can still add?
A pilot needs to fly 360 miles. If the aircraft’s average ground speed is 120 mph, how long will the trip take?
A maintenance crew can service 6 aircraft in 3 hours. How many aircraft can they service in 6 hours at the same rate?
explanation: They double their time (6 hrs vs 3 hrs), so they can service 6 × 2 = 12 aircraft.

text: If one turbine engine produces 5,000 pounds of thrust, how much total thrust do four engines produce together?
A truck delivers 20 pallets per trip. If 140 pallets must be delivered, how many trips are required?
An aircraft descends 3,000 feet every 10 minutes. How far will it descend in 25 minutes?
A cargo hold can fit 15 crates per row, with 10 rows total. How many crates can it hold?
If a plane travels 600 miles in 2 hours, what is its average speed?
A flight engineer must divide 90 gallons of oil equally among 6 engines. How many gallons go to each engine?
A delivery drone uses 2% of its battery per minute. After 25 minutes, what percentage remains?
A plane’s fuel efficiency is 5 miles per gallon. How many gallons are needed for a 250-mile trip?
If a gear with 10 teeth drives another with 20 teeth, the larger gear will
explanation: The larger gear has twice the teeth, so it turns half as fast.

text: A conveyor belt moves 30 packages per minute. How many packages in 15 minutes?
A plane’s crew includes 2 pilots and 6 attendants. If 1/3 of attendants take a break, how many remain working?
explanation: 1/3 of 6 = 2 on break, leaving 6 − 2 = 4 working attendants.

text: A mechanic needs 45 minutes to inspect one aircraft. How many can be inspected in 6 hours?
A flight covers 960 miles in 4 hours. What is the plane’s average speed?
If a shipment contains 24 boxes weighing 25 pounds each, what is the total weight?
A runway needs 1,500 gallons of de-icing fluid per hour. How many gallons are needed for a 5-hour operation?
A supply truck uses 12 gallons per 60 miles. How many miles per gallon does it get?
If a plane’s crew alternates 2-hour shifts and the flight lasts 10 hours, how many full shifts occur?
An aircraft wing supports 12,000 pounds of lift per side. What is the total lift supported?
A repair team replaces 5 parts per hour. How long to replace 40 parts?
A pilot increases speed from 300 to 360 mph. What is the percentage increase?
A plane travels 720 miles in 3 hours. If the same plane flies for 5 hours, how far will it travel?
A pilot uses 75 gallons of fuel for a 300-mile trip. What is the fuel consumption rate?
A logistics unit packs 240 boxes into containers, each holding 30 boxes. How many containers are filled?
If a runway is 1.5 miles long, how many feet long is it? (1 mile = 5280 feet)
An aircraft can hold 150 passengers. On a particular flight, 80% of the seats are filled. How many passengers are on board?
A hangar can store 8 helicopters. Each helicopter requires 900 sq ft. What is the total area required?
A jet cruises at 480 mph. How long does it take to fly 960 miles?
A cargo bay is 12 ft wide, 10 ft high, and 40 ft long. What is its volume?
If 3 mechanics complete a task in 4 hours, how long would it take 6 mechanics at the same rate?
explanation: Double the workers = half the time → 4 ÷ 2 = 2 hours.

text: A flight covers 900 miles in 3 hours. What is the average speed?
A 10,000 lb truck hauls 4,000 lbs of cargo. What percent of its total capacity is being used?
A small aircraft burns 8 gallons of fuel per hour. How much fuel will it use on a 5-hour flight?
A conveyor belt loads 120 boxes in 8 minutes. How many boxes per minute?
If a plane climbs at a rate of 1,200 feet per minute, how long will it take to reach 9,600 feet?
A logistics hub sends 45 shipments each day. How many shipments in a week?
A pilot’s flight plan shows a crosswind reducing ground speed by 15 mph. If airspeed is 200 mph, what is ground speed?
A maintenance schedule requires inspection every 50 flight hours. How many inspections occur in 600 hours?
A 60 ft rope is cut into 12 equal sections. How long is each section?
A transport ship travels 900 miles in 30 hours. What is its average speed?
A helicopter rotor spins 400 times per minute. How many rotations occur in 15 minutes?
A jet burns 1,800 gallons of fuel over a 3-hour flight. What is the hourly burn rate?
A storage warehouse holds 1,200 crates. If 25% are shipped out, how many remain?
A pilot descends from 24,000 ft to 6,000 ft over 9 minutes. What is the descent rate per minute?
If a plane carries 5,000 gallons of fuel and burns 400 gallons per hour, how many hours can it fly?
A radar system scans 3 sectors per second. How many scans occur in 10 minutes?
A cargo plane must carry 18,000 lbs of equipment evenly split across 6 compartments. How much weight per compartment?
A truck travels at 60 mph for 2.5 hours. How far does it travel?
A helicopter uses 120 gallons of fuel on a 4-hour flight. What is its hourly fuel usage?
A vehicle’s fuel tank holds 24 gallons. If it uses 8 gallons per 100 miles, how far can it travel on a full tank?
A pilot flies east 300 miles, then north 400 miles. What is the straight-line distance from the start point?
A maintenance crew inspects 5 planes per day. How many planes can they inspect in 4 weeks (28 days)?
A ship travels 240 miles at 30 mph. How many hours does the trip take?
A repair takes 18 hours with 3 workers. If 6 workers complete it at the same rate, how long will it take?
A jet’s top speed is 720 mph, but due to wind, the ground speed is reduced by 12%. What is the new ground speed?
An aircraft flies 540 miles in 1.5 hours. What is its average speed?
A container can hold 2,500 lbs. If each box weighs 125 lbs, how many boxes fit in one container?
A 50-gallon fuel tank is 40% full. How many gallons of fuel does it contain?
An engineer tests 8 engines and finds 2 are defective. What percentage are operational?
A supply plane drops 9 crates evenly spaced over 3 miles. What is the spacing between each drop?
A 10,000-lb jet uses 500 lbs of fuel for every 30 minutes of flight. How much fuel in 2 hours?
A propeller completes 1,200 revolutions per minute. How many in 15 seconds?
If a truck’s top speed is 60 mph but must reduce speed by 15% in rain, what is the new speed?
explanation: 60 × 0.85 = 51 mph → closest is 50 mph if rounding conservatively.

text: An aircraft starts with 9,000 lbs of fuel and uses 600 lbs every 15 minutes. How much fuel after 1 hour?
A transport vehicle makes 12 trips to deliver 4,800 lbs of cargo. How much per trip?
A jet travels 1,200 miles in 2 hours. If headwinds reduce speed by 25%, how long will the same trip take?
explanation: Speed reduced to 75%. Time increases by 1/0.75 = 1.33× → 2 × 1.33 ≈ 2.66 → about 3 hours.

text: A runway must be extended from 6,000 ft to 7,200 ft. What percent increase is this?
A cargo container holds 500 cubic feet. If 60% is filled, how many cubic feet remain empty?
An aircraft makes a 900-mile round trip twice per day. How many miles in a 5-day period?
A maintenance task is done every 25 flight hours. How many tasks in 200 hours?
A plane’s cargo load is increased by 10% from 20,000 lbs. What is the new load?
If a worker earns $15 per hour and works 8 hours a day for 5 days, how much will they earn in two weeks?
A car travels 180 miles in 3 hours. What is its average speed?
A recipe calls for 3 cups of flour for every 2 cups of sugar. If you use 9 cups of flour, how many cups of sugar will you need?
A jacket costs $80 but is discounted by 25%. What is the sale price?
If 5 pencils cost $1.25, what is the cost of 12 pencils?
A car uses 12 gallons of gas to travel 300 miles. How many miles can it travel on 20 gallons?
A store buys apples at $0.30 each and sells them for $0.45 each. How much profit is made on 200 apples?
If 3x = 18, what is the value of x + 5?
A train travels 240 miles in 4 hours. How far will it go in 6 hours at the same speed?
The price of an item increased from $40 to $50. What is the percent increase?
If 8 workers complete a job in 6 days, how many days will it take 12 workers (same rate)?
explanation: Work is inversely proportional to number of

text: A boat travels downstream at 12 mph and upstream at 8 mph. What is the boat’s speed in still water?
If a car’s fuel tank holds 15 gallons and it travels 360 miles on a full tank, what is the car’s fuel efficiency?
If 40% of a number is 60, what is the number?
A bag contains 3 red, 4 blue, and 5 green balls. What fraction are blue?
An airplane travels 480 miles in 1 hour and 20 minutes. What is its average speed?
A $200 item is discounted 10% and then taxed 5%. What is the final price?
If 2/3 of a number is 12, what is the number?
A plane flies at 480 mph for 3 hours and 15 minutes. How far does it travel?
If you invest $500 at 8% annual simple interest, how much interest will you earn after 3 years?
If a car depreciates by 15% each year, what is its value after one year if it was $20,000?
A runner completes 3 laps of a 400-meter track. How many kilometers has the runner completed?
A tank fills at a rate of 12 gallons per minute. How long will it take to fill 180 gallons?
A car rental costs $50 per day plus $0.20 per mile. How much for 3 days and 200 miles?
If a student’s test average increases from 75 to 90, by how many percentage points did it increase?
If a truck travels 270 miles on 15 gallons of fuel, what is its fuel efficiency?
An aircraft travels 480 miles in 2 hours. How far will it travel in 3.5 hours at the same speed?
If a pilot consumes 12 gallons of fuel every 30 minutes, how much fuel is used in a 3-hour flight?
A warehouse has 360 crates equally distributed on 12 pallets. How many crates are on each pallet?
If a radio signal travels at 186,000 miles per second, how far does it travel in 0.02 seconds?
A container holds 15 liters of water. How many 0.75-liter bottles can be filled?
A plane ascends 2,000 feet per minute. How high will it be after 12 minutes?
A machine produces 480 parts in 8 hours. How many parts can it produce in 10 hours?
If a pilot flies at 240 knots for 2.5 hours, how many nautical miles are traveled?
A radar detects an aircraft 90 miles away. If the plane approaches at 360 mph, how long until contact?
explanation: Time = Distance ÷ Speed = 90 ÷ 360 hr = 0.25 hr = 15 minutes.

text: If 40% of a squadron’s aircraft are out of service and there are 12 in service, how many total aircraft are there?
A runway requires 1,200 lights spaced every 30 feet. How long is the runway?
A storage tank fills at 45 gallons per minute. How many gallons in 40 minutes?
An aircraft descends from 28,000 ft to 10,000 ft in 6 minutes. What is its rate of descent?
If a ship’s speed is 24 knots, how long will it take to travel 72 nautical miles?
If a mechanic repairs 3 engines in 5 hours, how many engines can 4 mechanics repair in 10 hours?
A base has 720 personnel divided evenly among 12 units. How many personnel per unit?
If 5 gallons of paint cover 1,200 sq ft, how many gallons are needed for 4,800 sq ft?
A shipment weighs 4,500 pounds. If divided into 50 equal crates, what is the weight per crate?
If a pilot flies 500 miles at 250 mph, how long does the flight take?
A 20% increase on 150 gives what value?
An airplane burns 1,200 gallons of fuel on a 3-hour flight. How much fuel per hour?
If 8 bolts weigh 12 ounces, how much do 20 bolts weigh?
A vehicle uses 16 gallons of fuel to travel 384 miles. How far can it go on 20 gallons?
If 30% of a class of 80 students are female, how many are male?
A cargo truck can carry 3,600 pounds. If each crate weighs 120 pounds, how many crates can it transport at once?
A generator uses 4 gallons of fuel per hour. How many gallons will it use in 9.5 hours?
A maintenance team completes 45 inspections in 9 days. At this rate, how many will they complete in 15 days?
A base has 12 water tanks. Each tank holds 2,500 gallons. How much water can they store in total?
A technician earns $24.50 per hour and works 37 hours in a week. What is their weekly pay before taxes?
An aircraft covers 1,200 miles in 3 hours. What is its average speed?
A radar rotates 12 times every minute. How many rotations does it complete in 2 hours?
If a map scale is 1 inch = 5 miles, how many miles are represented by 3.6 inches?
A squad needs 480 meals for a week. If each person consumes 3 meals per day, how many people are in the squad?
A pilot uses 18 gallons per hour. How many gallons will be needed for a 5.5-hour flight?
A supply clerk packs 15 boxes per hour. How long will it take to pack 210 boxes?
A drone flies 24 miles in 30 minutes. What is its average speed in miles per hour?
If 30% of a shipment of 500 parts is defective, how many are usable?
A base vehicle drives 280 miles using 16 gallons of fuel. What is its average miles per gallon?
A security patrol covers 2.5 miles every 30 minutes. How far will they travel in 3 hours?
A shipment of 45 boxes weighs 1,125 pounds total. What is the average weight per box?
If 5 mechanics can repair 10 vehicles in 4 days, how many vehicles can 8 mechanics repair in the same time?
A piece of equipment costs $6,000 new but depreciates by 15% each year. What is its value after one year?
An air filter must be replaced every 120 flight hours. If a jet flies 8 hours daily, how many days until replacement?
A delivery route covers 75 miles in 1 hour 15 minutes. What is the average speed?
A computer processes 300 files in 12 minutes. How many files per minute is that?
A base stores 2,400 gallons of fuel. If 15% is used during drills, how much remains?
A maintenance part costs $48 each, but buying 10 or more gives a 20% discount. How much do 12 parts cost?
A field exercise lasts from
:30 A.M. to
:45 P.M. How long does it last in hours and minutes?
A communications relay transmits 240 messages in 8 hours. How many messages can it send in 10 hours at the same rate?
A network operations team monitors 4,800 packets over 12 minutes. What is the average packet rate per minute?
A data center uses 18 servers that each draw 450 watts. What is the total power usage in kilowatts?
A cybersecurity analyst finds that 12 of 600 scanned hosts are vulnerable. What percentage is affected?
An encryption process takes 45 seconds for 900 MB. How long for 2,400 MB at the same rate?
A sysadmin backs up 2.5 TB of data daily. How much is stored in 28 days?
If a project requires 240 staff-hours and 8 technicians are assigned, how long will it take?
A satellite link has 96 Mbps bandwidth. If encryption overhead uses 25%, what is usable bandwidth?
A cyber defense drill lasts 7 hours and 20 minutes. How many minutes total?
An analyst reviews 1,500 logs in 3 hours. At this pace, how many logs in 8 hours?
A cloud system's uptime target is 99.9%. Over 30 days, how many minutes of downtime are allowed?
A secure line encrypts data at 240 MB/s. How long to transmit 7.2 GB?
A team processes 75 tickets daily with 5 engineers. If 2 more join, how many per engineer per day to keep same pace?
A code deployment succeeds 95 times out of 100. What is its failure rate?
A system stores 1.2 GB logs per hour. How many GB in 2.5 days?
A team’s on-call rotation has 6 members covering 24 hours equally. How many hours each?
A secure network transmits 9 GB of logs in 15 minutes. What is its average throughput?
explanation: 9 GB = 72 Gb → 72 ÷ 15 = 4.8 Gbps = 4800 Mbps ÷ 50 = 96 Mbps average.

text: A storage cluster adds 12% redundancy to 80 TB usable space. What is the total required capacity?
A cybersecurity exercise has 120 participants. If 30% focus on blue team defense, how many is that?
A server’s CPU utilization averages 72% of 16 cores. How many cores are typically active?
A security patch rollout is 80% complete after 4 of 5 planned waves. How many systems total if 800 are done?
An encrypted link transmits at 120 KB/s. How long to send a 36 MB file?
A cyber threat model identifies 45 risks; 12 are high priority. What percentage are high?
A base’s IT team reduces incident response time from 90 min to 54 min. What is the improvement percentage?
A penetration test lasts 10 days. If 3 days are spent on reporting, what percent is testing time?
A cloud backup uploads 48 GB over 2 hours. How long to upload 120 GB at same rate?
A car travels 240 miles in 4 hours. What is its average speed?
A store has a 25% off sale. If a jacket costs $80 before tax, what is the sale price?
A recipe requires 2.5 cups of flour for 10 servings. How much flour for 4 servings?
A phone plan includes 12 GB of data per month. How much data is that per day in a 30-day month?
A person earns $54,000 per year. What is their approximate monthly income before taxes?
A delivery van uses 18 gallons to travel 270 miles. What is its miles per gallon?
A store marks an item down 15% from $120. What is the new price?
A computer is discounted from $1,250 to $1,000. What is the percent discount?
A train travels 180 miles in 3 hours. How far in 5 hours at the same speed?
A laptop battery lasts 9 hours. If you have used 3 hours, what percent of charge remains?
A job pays $20 per hour with a 10% bonus for overtime. What is the overtime rate?
If 5 workers complete a project in 12 days, how many days would 10 workers take (same rate)?
explanation: Double workers → half the time → 12 ÷ 2 = 6 days.

text: A school has 1,200 students. If 25% take art, how many do not take art?
A phone battery charges from 30% to 90% in 2 hours. How much does it charge per hour?
A loan of $5,000 has 6% simple annual interest. How much interest after 3 years?
A recipe doubles ingredients. If it calls for ¾ cup sugar, how much is needed when doubled?
A worker earns $720 for 40 hours. What is the hourly rate?
A discount reduces a $150 item to $120. What percentage is the discount?
A machine fills 300 bottles in 12 minutes. How many bottles per hour?
If a printer produces 15 pages per minute, how long to print 450 pages?
A student earns grades 85, 90, 88, and 92. What is the average?
A rectangular garden is 8 m by 12 m. What is its perimeter?
A family spends $720 monthly on rent, which is 30% of income. What is their total monthly income?
A train leaves at
:45 a.m. and arrives at
:10 a.m. How long is the trip?
A savings account earns 4% yearly interest. How much interest on $2,500 after one year?
